ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Client Saved On and Canceled Date fields from being simultaneously populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( NOT(ISNULL(Client_Saved_On__c)) ), ( NOT(ISNULL(Canceled_Date__c)) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have 'Client Saved On' and 'Canceled Date' populated at the same time.
